column3: ntsaban worakaworaka asaase a ɔwɔ Etiopia nsutsen egya no ho:"
a wɔtsetse ndzɛm ahɛn mu wɔ nsu enyi! Hom nkɔ
column4: abɔfo a hom ho yɛ har
column5: hom nkɔ ɔman a wɔyɛ apankor trontrom no nkyɛn
column6: nkorɔfo a mbɛnee na ekyirekyir suro hɔn no nkyɛn; ɔman bi a wɔwɔ tum na wɔka nkorɔfo hyɛ a nsutsen etwitwa hɔn asaase mu no!"

column4: sɛ wosi frankaa wɔ mbepɔw do a
column5: hom nhwɛ; na sɛ wɔbɔ akasamu mu a

column2: "Na dza EWURADZE aka akyerɛ me nye yi
column4: na mahwɛ wɔ me tsenabea; dɛ ewiaber ketee mu ɔhyew
column5: dɛ ɔbɔsu nsuwusiw wɔ otwaber hyew mu."

column2: "Na otwaber nnyae nndurii na nkukuduuduw apaa
column3: na nhyiren adan wenyinaba a ɔregyegye no
column4: ɔdze adar botwitwa nsasar no egu
column5: na ndubaa a ɔatsentsen no etwitwa mu egu."

column2: "Wobegya ne nyinara hɔ ama mbepɔw do nnoma edzinam
column4: na nnoma edzinam bedzi ɔpɛber wɔ do
column5: na asaase mbowa nyinara edzi do awɔwber."

column2: "Ber no mu wɔdze akyɛdze bɛbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE; wɔdze fi nkorɔfo apankor trontrom no
column3: nkorɔfo a mbɛnee na ekyirekyir nyinara suro hɔn
column4: ɔman a wɔwɔ tum na wɔka nkorɔfo hyɛ a nsutsen etwitwa hɔn asaase mu no mu no
column5: bɛba dɔm EWURADZE ne dzin tsenabea
